name: Optics Lab
description: Explore classical mechanics through interactive simulations of forces, motion, and energy. Perfect for understanding Newton's laws and fundamental physics concepts.
author: Abhinav Prajapati

name: Microprocessor Lab
description: Dive into the fundamentals of logic design with hands-on experiments. Learn about digital circuits, Boolean algebra, and the principles of designing combinational and sequential logic systems.
author: Mansi Samant
